website_summaries.verdict: The BenQ BL2710PT is a 27-inch WQHD monitor designed for CAD/CAM professionals. It is equipped with numerous ports and convenient features, but its color accuracy is a bit off, and the darkest shades of gray are crushed.
cons: Dark grayscale performance could be better

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is an extremely nice QuadHD monitor. My only complaint is that Amazon does not list the fact that the monitor is pre-packaged with every cable you can conceivably require. I ended up buying cables I don't need. Also, the 2560x1440 was only available to me through the HDMI cable and not the DVI-D cable. This may be a function of the video card purchased to drive the monitor, but I don't really care at this point as it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: TCB47

customer_reviews.title: BenQ BL2710PT (27" monitor) = IDEAL!
customer_reviews.text: I am loving my new BenQ BL2710PT monitor. Tons of OSD settings- the controls take some getting used to, but are quite innovative. Gorgeous picture with my rMBP 15". LOTS of cables came included, EXCEPT the 2 that I needed: miniDisplayport to DisplayPort, and a power cable long enough to reach the floor at a stand-up desk. (both were minor issues) I researched thoroughly, and almost purchased the Dell 27", and then almost the Asus 27" monitors. This BenQ is a perfect image, so beautiful at full resolution- 2560x1440 (only with the miniDP adapter). The only small drawback I've noticed: this monitor has a "normal" bezel, not minimal like some others. This is worth the extra $$ in my mind.
customer_reviews.author: Jay-Dub

customer_reviews.title: Very Low Eye Fatigue
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a 28" display that was giving me eyesight problems after long usage. Read about the Low Blue Light capability, tried it, LOVE IT! Using this monitor makes a HUGE difference in eye fatigue. The stand makes it easy to move up/down and tilt back/forth. Rotating is possible, although only in one direction. Some stands for 27" displays do not have as large footprint, however, so I can't say this is a five-star display. I'd give it 4.5+ if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Lane O.

customer_reviews.title: Solid Choice
customer_reviews.text: Having used most 27" monitors on the market I will say this BenQ 27" is a keeper! I use it with a Macbook Pro Retina Late 2013 ... DP to Mini TB cable needed. This monitor has amazing colors and clarity. It does work ok with my PS4 but if you are buying a monitor for console gaming check out the BenQ Gaming Monitor RL2455HM ... that is my favorite all time console screen!
customer_reviews.author: mike23

customer_reviews.title: A good monitor for both creating and gaming
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of programming, gaming, and graphic design. This monitor works well for all of those tasks and at a great price. I did a fair amount of research before purchasing and glad I ended up with this monitor. My only complaint are the monitor controls, especially for adjusting brightness. It uses sensor buttons which don't always register presses and requires multiple levels of navigation for common operations like adjusting brightness. It does have a sensor for automatically adjusting brightness based on ambient light levels, but it didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Matt R

customer_reviews.title: Super addition to my Macbook Air 2013
customer_reviews.text: Super addition to my Macbook Air 2013. Definitely benefiting from the high resolution display mode. Working off the laptop screen and the BenQ together. Only downside was Amazon on delivery and, after a lot of back and forth, they made up for it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven L

customer_reviews.title: brilliant, and my new pc recognized it right away
customer_reviews.text: The screen id light, brilliant, and my new pc recognized it right away. Worth your investment. I used a swivel wall mount and never opened the stand hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Awesome monitor use it every day. I have had this monitor for about 4 months. Very clear. I use it for CAD and Microsoft products. Have not used it for Gaming.

customer_reviews.title: An amazing monitor. The display is bright and the colors ...
customer_reviews.text: An amazing monitor. The display is bright and the colors pop. I was worried that the text would be too small with this higher resolution, but it is just fine and I am going to buy another.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome monitor. Can hardly wait to buy another one
customer_reviews.text: Awesome monitor. Can hardly wait to buy another one. Very good quality with attention to detail.

customer_reviews.text: Beautiful monitor, though the unit I received has moderate back light bleeding which can be quite annoying. Overall I am very satisfied.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor and easy on the eyes. Colors are close close to what they should be.

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Monitor with a low response time for online gaming. Love the high resolution and the swivel makes it adjust easily. USB 3 is also fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Nathanb316

customer_reviews.title: Perfect monitor
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful picture quality makes other monitor look so dim compared to the colors and brightness. I use for work where I have to stare at a screen for nine hours a day, no headaches or eye fatigue at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy P Cox

customer_reviews.title: Mine had bad bleed. Exchange it for another
customer_reviews.text: Noticeable light bleed on right hand side. Do not mistaken light bleed with IPS glow, Mine had bad bleeds. Exchanging it for another, hopefully the second one will do better. Replacement arrived - This one has no light bleed at all but stuck pixels are all over the screen like I'm looking at a galaxy. Replacement is going back right away.
customer_reviews.author: blahblahblah

customer_reviews.title: Dead monitor shipped
customer_reviews.text: Monitor didn't display anything. Tried different connections and computers. Just a brick with a power light. Posting this review so others can be aware of potential bad monitors being shipped. Good luck.
customer_reviews.author: David Bluestone

customer_reviews.title: Good display, ridiculous  menu buttons, inconsistent color temperature
customer_reviews.text: No back-light leak, to stuck pixels, which means no panel lottery here! Nice colour balance out of the box based on visual - have not checked with any calibrator. Non flickering design - no headaches for me. Removing 1 star for truly cumbersome front panel menu, which is supposedly "touch" buttons but in fact you have to hold your finger on led lights for 1-2 seconds to trigger action - ridiculously painful. I initially thought I got dead monitor since I could not trigger power on button. Remving second star for poor colour temprature consistency: left half of panel is visibly warmer that the right one - in this price range this is not acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

product_meta.title: BenQ BL2710PT 27" Professional Creative Design Monitor
product_meta.description:
THE WORLD'S FIRST CUSTOM-BUILT 27" 2560X1440 WIDE QUAD HD MONITOR
Featuring a 27", 2560x1440 Wide Quad HD (WQHD) resolution, BenQ's BL2710PT delivers four times the number of pixels compared to an HD resolution ensuring users more crisp images than your traditional 1080p resolution. Tailored for CAD/CAM users, the BL2710PT delivers essential tools for professionals working with SolidWorks, PTC, AutoCAD, Maya, or other CAD/CAM software.

With a WQHD display, enjoy working with 77% more work space.View larger The Display Pilot Software detects the monitor's physical rotation.View larger BIGGER SCREEN, MORE SPACE MEANS MORE PIXELS, BETTER DETAIL
With a WQHD display, enjoy working with 77% more work space. Additionally, a WQHD provides 109 pixels per inch (PPI) allowing images to look more crisp than ever. Designed with CAD/CAM users in mind, the BL2710PT's Display Pilot Software provides a CAD/CAM mode that cares about the details. Whether it is handling a simple or complicated wireframe design, users will be able to better distinguish multiple line contours within their design. You will never miss a line again.

ADVANCED HYPER VIEWING ANGLE (AHVA) PANEL WITH DISPLAY PILOT SOFTWARE
With the BenQ's advanced AHVA panel and 100% sRGB color gamut, every color is delivered with the finest precision in an ultra-wide 178-degree viewing angle. And the Display Pilot Software detects the monitor's physical rotation and will automatically rotate the image in either a landscape or portrait orientation. With just one click, the software will partition your active windows providing an enhanced desktop work space.

TECHNOLOGY FOR COMFORTABLE VIEWING
ZeroFlicker technology reduces discomfort of long work days by virtually eliminating eye fatigue. Traditional monitor screens flick 200 times per second. Though undetectable to the naked eye, viewing discomfort is experienced with these traditional monitors. The ZeroFlicker technology eliminates flickering at all brightness levels and effectively provides long lasting comfortable viewing. An additional Reading Mode emulates traditional paper brightness, contrast ratio, and sharpness allowing digital documents to easily look like you are reading a book. Plus, the BL2710PT features an Eye Protect Sensor which, based on the ambient light levels detected by the monitor, will automatically adjust its brightness throughout the day. This enhances the display's clarity and your viewing comfort. An optional "Smart Reminder" icon appears to remind users to take a break after a specific amount of time.


Slim bezel allows for a smoother image to be displayed across multiple monitors.View larger SMART DESIGN CHOICES FOR BETTER WORKSPACES
The BL2710PT's slim bezel allows for a smoother image to be displayed across multiple monitors. And with extensive monitor adjustments like height, tilt, pivot, and swivel, you can tailor your own unique working station that is best suited for your height and viewing preferences. The BL2710PT also features an integrated hub with 2 USB 3.0 ports—you can download a 10GB file in just 5 minutes. Two additional USB 2.0 connectors allow for keyboard and other device connectivity.


KEY FEATURES
 * Screen Size: 27"W 
 * Aspect Ratio: 16:9 
 * Resolution (max.): 2560x1440 
 * Pixel Pitch (mm): 0.2331 
 * Brightness (typ.): 350 cd/m2 
 * Contrast (typ.): 1000:1 
 * Panel Type: AHVA 
 * Viewing Angle: 178/178 degrees (horizontal/vertical) 
 * Response Time: 12ms, 4ms (GtG) 
 * Display Colors: 1.07 Billion 
 * Color Gamut: 100% sRGB
